title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.15 - Cabinets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.15 - Cabinets

State Regulations

Cabinets shall be provided for storage of clean linen ad towels. They shall have tight fitting doors that shall be kept closed to protect the linen and towels from dust and dirt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
10.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
